Address.City: Azores - Sao Miguel Island - Ponta Delgada

Description.Text: With a strong connection to the sea and nature, the Azor Hotel is the starting point to discover the Azores.
Ponta Delgada downtown is just a few steps away, the hotel is ideally located next to the city major attractions and the well known area of "Portas do Mar".
This accommodation has a small lobby.
